answer:
The question is asking for the answer to identify the person Isaac Newton and what he accomplished.

The answer is:

Isaac Newton was born on December 25, 1642, and was an English mathematician, physicist, astronomer and alchemist. In 1687, he published Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica, which set forth the mathematical principles underlying motion, gravitation and motion of objects. He is considered one of the greatest mathematicians and physicists of all time, and
